fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Fury Cutter**: Use 1 bee to choose a player. If you've used this ability on them before, deal an X-tier attack to them, where X is the number of times you've used it on them before.
**Defend Order**: Use 2 bees to permanently increase your defense by a stage, up to Invincible, and prevent all nonattacking abilities targetting you tonight.
**Pollen Puff**: Use 3 bees to choose a player. If they win with you, heal them. If they don't, deal an Unstoppable attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value: **Honey Gather**: At the beginning of each day, if you have no permanent attack or defense modifications, you have a 50% chance of gaining an additional bee.
